modName: Weathered Locks - A Lockpicking Interface Retexture
summary: It retextures the vanilla locks to make them look worn, weathered and aged.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
SO, I was lockpicking in skyrim when I though I'm bored of these locks, so I decided to make a little change (I know it's very minute, you don't need to tell me that) so I added a bit of green a hint of orange a splash of black and a tiny bit of dark green and here we are... I'm going to update it when I have a few hours (scratches, worn lockpicks... that sort of stuff). I'd love some advice on what you'd like to see next time I update it.

Install:
Just drag and drop, same as you would with any retexture (I'll probably explain in the readme)

Notes:
I really do appreciate all advice, I do read what you say... I'm always reading what you say...
author: jedgej

files.name: Weathered Locks V2
files.changelogHtml:
Updated appearence
Fixed an issue with incorrect folder names, sorry for any inconvenience
